Founder.label: About the founder
Founder.title: Technical founder who builds himself – not an anonymous agency
Founder.p1: My name is Isak Didriksson and I have a fullstack background with Next.js, TypeScript and modern cloud platforms. Instead of delegating everything to juniors in an agency, I am personally involved in architecture, code and conversion strategy on every single page.
Founder.p2: My goal is simple: that medium-sized companies like yours should avoid slow, confusing WordPress solutions and agency dependency. You get a tailor-made, technically solid site that is easy to own yourself – with a focus on speed, SEO and measurable results.
Founder.p3: Every delivery includes clear metrics, PageSpeed reports and insight into what actually drives traffic and leads. This way you see in black and white that the investment pays off.

list.1: 10+ years of experience with web development and product
list.2: Expertise in performance, SEO and conversion
list.3: Works directly with founders and general managers
list.4: One responsible person – not five different contact points

CTASection.title: Ready for a website that actually sells?
CTASection.description: Book a no-obligation strategy meeting and let's discuss how we can help your business grow digitally.

trust.process: Safe process with approval along the way

CTASection.disclaimer: No obligations. 30 minute call to discuss your project.

0.question: How can you deliver in 14 days?
0.answer: We have a proven process and use modern technology like Next.js and Tailwind CSS. This, combined with a dedicated team and close communication with you, makes it possible to deliver quality websites in a short time.

1.question: What is included in the price?
1.answer: The price includes design, development, SEO optimization, hosting for the first year, SSL certificate, and training on how to update the content. There are no hidden costs.

2.question: Can I get changes after launch?
2.answer: Yes! All packages include 2 rounds of revisions in the project. After launch, we offer maintenance agreements starting at 999 NOK/month which include ongoing changes and support.

3.question: How does SEO optimization work?
3.answer: We build the website with SEO in mind from the start. This includes technical SEO (speed, structure, metadata), on-page SEO (content, headings, images), and setup of Google Search Console and Analytics.

4.question: Do I need technical knowledge to update the website?
4.answer: No! We set up a user-friendly CMS (content management system) where you can easily update text and images without technical knowledge. We also provide training.

5.question: What happens if I am not satisfied?
5.answer: We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you are not satisfied with the design after the first draft, we work for free until you are satisfied – or you get your money back.
